32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Abdullah b. Mughaffal who said I found a bag containing fat on the day of the Battle of Khaibar. I caught hold of it and said:I will not give anything today from it to anybody. Then I turned round and saw that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was smiling (at my words)

chapter.ara-name: باب أَخْذِ الطَّعَامِ مِنْ أَرْضِ الْعَدُوِّ
chapter.eng-name: Permissibility of eating food seized as booty in Dar Al-Harb
